comment.body:
The Port.Info class extends {@link Line.Info} with additional information specific to ports, including the port's name and whether it is a source or a target for its mixer. By definition, a port acts as either a source or a target to its mixer, but not both. (Audio input ports are sources; audio output ports are targets.)

To learn what ports are available, you can retrieve port info objects through the {@link Mixer#getSourceLineInfo getSourceLineInfo} and {@link Mixer#getTargetLineInfo getTargetLineInfo} methods of the Mixer interface. Instances of the Port.Info class may also be constructed and used to obtain lines matching the parameters specified in the Port.Info object. @author Kara Kytle @version 1.26, 04/05/05 @since 1.3
